product_name: Big Tree Hikes of the Redwood Coast: A Guide to the Giants
long_description: A guide to awe-inspiring forests filled with ancient behemoths,. Author: Tyler Williams. Softcover; 87 pages; color photographs and maps. Funhog Press; copyright 2012. Author provides short and mid-distance hikes throughout the Redwood forests of Northern California. Each hike offers a detailed description, directions to trailhead, round-trip distance, optimal seasons, trail surface, difficulty, overview maps and photographs of the route. A slender volume that you can easily stash in a day pack,.
short_description: A guide to awe-inspiring forests filled with ancient behemoths, Big Tree Hikes of the Redwood Coast: A Guide to the Giants helps you explore the last tracts of these magnificent trees.
